input.description:
The name of a configuration item defined in a configuration module.
Example: BMC_AR_System or HP_ServiceCenter,BMC_Remedyforce, ServiceNow
This contains the name or the id of the field you wish to search against.
This contains the value you are looking for in the key 1 field.

Optional second key name or id
Note: HP ServiceCenter does not support for input values for key 2.

Optional additional value
Note: HP ServiceCenter does not support for input values for value 2.

A query based upon the values and keys in the above fields.
Example: 'key1' = "value1" and 'key2' < "value2"
Note: HP ServiceCenter,ServiceNow and BMC_Remedyforce does not support for input values for query.

output.description: An XML document that contains detail for one or more incidents

String Value - Indicates whether or not the process completed successfully.
Valid values: success, failure
String Value - A process specific explanation for the value of success status.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <fields> <xsl:apply-templates /> </fields> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="mappings/*"> <xsl:if test="string(@queryable) = '' or @queryable='true' "> <field> <xsl:value-of select="." /> </field> </xsl:if> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="query" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <schema>${schema name}</schema> <key>${key 1}</key> <value>${value 1}</value> <key2>${key 2}</key2> <value2>${value 2}</value2> <query> <xsl:value-of select="." /> </query> ${fields} </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="value" />
<xsl:template match="/"> <entries> <xsl:apply-templates/> </entries> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="entry"> <xsl:copy-of select="."/> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="metadata" />
</xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${translated key 1}') = '0'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">change-number</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${translated key 1}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" encoding="XML" cdata-section-elements="query " /> <xsl:variable name="query-value">$[query]</xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <entity-type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">change</xsl:text> </entity-type> <operation-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">retrieve-change</xsl:text> </operation-name> <model> <keys /> <instance> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length($query-value)!='0'"> <header /> <description-structure /> <middle /> <close /> <query>$[query]</query> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <header> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Structure</xsl:text> </type> <xsl:if test="'${location value}'='header'"> <xsl:element name="${translated key 1}"> <value>${value 1}</value> <type>${type value}</type> </xsl:element> </xsl:if> </header> <description-structure> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Structure</xsl:text> </type> <xsl:if test="'${location value}'='description-structure'"> <xsl:element name="${translated key 1}"> <value>${value 1}</value> <type>${type value}</type> </xsl:element> </xsl:if> </description-structure> <middle> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Structure</xsl:text> </type> <xsl:if test="'${location value}'='middle'"> <xsl:element name="${translated key 1}"> <value>${value 1}</value> <type>${type value}</type> </xsl:element> </xsl:if> </middle> <close> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Structure</xsl:text> </type> <xsl:if test="'${location value}'='close'"> <xsl:element name="${translated key 1}"> <value>${value 1}</value> <type>${type value}</type> </xsl:element> </xsl:if> </close> <xsl:if test="'${location value}'='instance'"> <xsl:element name="${translated key 1}"> <value>${value 1}</value> <type>${type value}</type> </xsl:element> </xsl:if> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </instance> </model> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:xalan="http://xml.apache.org/xalan" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="query-mappings">${query mappings}</xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="/"> <hp-service-center-response> <xsl:copy-of select="node()/*" /> <mappings> <xsl:copy-of select="xalan:nodeset($query-mappings)/*/*" /> </mappings> </hp-service-center-response> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Changes> <xsl:for-each select="//item/parameters/model/instance"> <Change> <xsl:apply-templates select=".//descendant::header" /> <xsl:apply-templates select=".//descendant::description-structure" /> <xsl:apply-templates select=".//descendant::middle" /> <xsl:apply-templates select=".//descendant::close" /> <xsl:apply-templates select="." /> </Change> </xsl:for-each> </Changes> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="header"> <xsl:for-each select="*"> <xsl:variable name="instance-element-child-name" select="local-name()" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="type/text()='Array'"> <xsl:variable name="current-node-set" select="*[local-name()=$instance-element-child-name]/element" /> <xsl:for-each select="*[local-name()=$instance-element-child-name]/element"> <xsl:variable name="element-position" select="position()" /> <!-- Pick the <mapping>'s child element name in case when a <mappings>'s child element's value starts with current <instance>'s child name and last character in this <mapping>'s child element's value is equal to position() of the current <element> --> <xsl:element name="{local-name(//mappings/*[starts-with(text(), $instance-element-child-name) and $element-position=substring(text(), string-length(text()))])}"> <xsl:value-of select="value/text()" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:if test="string-length(local-name(//mappings/*[./text()=$instance-element-child-name]))>0"> <xsl:element name="{local-name(//mappings/*[./text()=$instance-element-child-name])}"> <xsl:value-of select="value/text()" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:if> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="middle"> <xsl:for-each select="*"> <xsl:variable name="instance-element-child-name" select="local-name()" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="type/text()='Array'"> <xsl:variable name="current-node-set" select="*[local-name()=$instance-element-child-name]/element" /> <xsl:for-each select="*[local-name()=$instance-element-child-name]/element"> <xsl:variable name="element-position" select="position()" /> <!-- Pick the <mapping>'s child element name in case when a <mappings>'s child element's value starts with current <instance>'s child name and last character in this <mapping>'s child element's value is equal to position() of the current <element> --> <xsl:element name="{local-name(//mappings/*[starts-with(text(), $instance-element-child-name) and $element-position=substring(text(), string-length(text()))])}"> <xsl:value-of select="value/text()" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:if test="string-length(local-name(//mappings/*[./text()=$instance-element-child-name]))>0"> <xsl:element name="{local-name(//mappings/*[./text()=$instance-element-child-name])}"> <xsl:value-of select="value/text()" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:if> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="description-structure"> <xsl:for-each select="*"> <xsl:variable name="instance-element-child-name" select="local-name()" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="type/text()='Array'"> <xsl:variable name="current-node-set" select="*[local-name()=$instance-element-child-name]/element" /> <xsl:for-each select="*[local-name()=$instance-element-child-name]/element"> <xsl:variable name="element-position" select="position()" /> <!-- Pick the <mapping>'s child element name in case when a <mappings>'s child element's value starts with current <instance>'s child name and last character in this <mapping>'s child element's value is equal to position() of the current <element> --> <xsl:element name="{local-name(//mappings/*[starts-with(text(), $instance-element-child-name) and $element-position=substring(text(), string-length(text()))])}"> <xsl:value-of select="value/text()" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:if test="string-length(local-name(//mappings/*[./text()=$instance-element-child-name]))>0"> <xsl:element name="{local-name(//mappings/*[./text()=$instance-element-child-name])}"> <xsl:value-of select="value/text()" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:if> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="instance"> <xsl:for-each select="*"> <xsl:variable name="instance-element-child-name" select="local-name()" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="type/text()='Array'"> <xsl:variable name="current-node-set" select="*[local-name()=$instance-element-child-name]/element" /> <xsl:for-each select="*[local-name()=$instance-element-child-name]/element"> <xsl:variable name="element-position" select="position()" /> <!-- Pick the <mapping>'s child element name in case when a <mappings>'s child element's value starts with current <instance>'s child name and last character in this <mapping>'s child element's value is equal to position() of the current <element> --> <xsl:element name="{local-name(//mappings/*[starts-with(text(), $instance-element-child-name) and $element-position=substring(text(), string-length(text()))])}"> <xsl:value-of select="value/text()" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:if test="string-length(local-name(//mappings/*[./text()=$instance-element-child-name]))>0"> <xsl:element name="{local-name(//mappings/*[./text()=$instance-element-child-name])}"> <xsl:value-of select="value/text()" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:if> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="close"> <xsl:for-each select="*"> <xsl:variable name="instance-element-child-name" select="local-name()" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="type/text()='Array'"> <xsl:variable name="current-node-set" select="*[local-name()=$instance-element-child-name]/element" /> <xsl:for-each select="*[local-name()=$instance-element-child-name]/element"> <xsl:variable name="element-position" select="position()" /> <!-- Pick the <mapping>'s child element name in case when a <mappings>'s child element's value starts with current <instance>'s child name and last character in this <mapping>'s child element's value is equal to position() of the current <element> --> <xsl:element name="{local-name(//mappings/*[starts-with(text(), $instance-element-child-name) and $element-position=substring(text(), string-length(text()))])}"> <xsl:value-of select="value/text()" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:if test="string-length(local-name(//mappings/*[./text()=$instance-element-child-name]))>0"> <xsl:element name="{local-name(//mappings/*[./text()=$instance-element-child-name])}"> <xsl:value-of select="value/text()" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:if> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <objects> <queryString> <xsl:if test="string-length('${key 1}')>0 and string-length('${value 1}')>0 and string-length('${key 2}') = 0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">select name,ID,BMCServiceDesk__Change_Description__c,BMCServiceDesk__FKImpact__c,BMCServiceDesk__FKUrgency__c,BMCServiceDesk__Actual_Start_Date__c,BMCServiceDesk__FKCategory__c, BMCServiceDesk__Actual_End_Date__c,BMCServiceDesk__Scheduled_End_Date__c,BMCServiceDesk__Scheduled_Start_Date__c,BMCServiceDesk__Open_Date_Time__c, BMCServiceDesk__FKStatus__c,BMCServiceDesk__FKPriority__c,BMCServiceDesk__Change_Type__c,BMCServiceDesk__Change_Category__c,BMCServiceDesk__Reason_for_Change__c, BMCServiceDesk__Roll_Out_Plan__c,BMCServiceDesk__Back_Out_Plan__c,BMCServiceDesk__Review_Comments__c,BMCServiceDesk__Initiator_ID__c, BMCServiceDesk__Initiator_First_Name__c,BMCServiceDesk__Initiator_Last_Name__c, BMCServiceDesk__AllTaskCloseController__c from BMCServiceDesk__Change_Request__c where ${key 1} = '${value 1}'</xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${key 2}')>0 and string-length('${value 2}')>0 and string-length('${key 1}') >0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">select name,ID,BMCServiceDesk__Change_Description__c,BMCServiceDesk__FKImpact__c,BMCServiceDesk__FKUrgency__c,BMCServiceDesk__Actual_Start_Date__c,BMCServiceDesk__FKCategory__c, BMCServiceDesk__Actual_End_Date__c,BMCServiceDesk__Scheduled_End_Date__c,BMCServiceDesk__Scheduled_Start_Date__c,BMCServiceDesk__Open_Date_Time__c, BMCServiceDesk__FKStatus__c,BMCServiceDesk__FKPriority__c,BMCServiceDesk__Change_Type__c,BMCServiceDesk__Change_Category__c,BMCServiceDesk__Reason_for_Change__c, BMCServiceDesk__Roll_Out_Plan__c,BMCServiceDesk__Back_Out_Plan__c,BMCServiceDesk__Review_Comments__c,BMCServiceDesk__Initiator_ID__c, BMCServiceDesk__Initiator_First_Name__c,BMCServiceDesk__Initiator_Last_Name__c, BMCServiceDesk__AllTaskCloseController__c from BMCServiceDesk__Change_Request__c where ${key 1} = '${value 1}' and ${key 2} = '${value 2}'</xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${key 2}')=0 and string-length('${key 1}')= 0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">select name,ID,BMCServiceDesk__Change_Description__c,BMCServiceDesk__FKImpact__c,BMCServiceDesk__FKUrgency__c,BMCServiceDesk__Actual_Start_Date__c,BMCServiceDesk__FKCategory__c, BMCServiceDesk__Actual_End_Date__c,BMCServiceDesk__Scheduled_End_Date__c,BMCServiceDesk__Scheduled_Start_Date__c,BMCServiceDesk__Open_Date_Time__c, BMCServiceDesk__FKStatus__c,BMCServiceDesk__FKPriority__c,BMCServiceDesk__Change_Type__c,BMCServiceDesk__Change_Category__c,BMCServiceDesk__Reason_for_Change__c, BMCServiceDesk__Roll_Out_Plan__c,BMCServiceDesk__Back_Out_Plan__c,BMCServiceDesk__Review_Comments__c,BMCServiceDesk__Initiator_ID__c, BMCServiceDesk__Initiator_First_Name__c,BMCServiceDesk__Initiator_Last_Name__c, BMCServiceDesk__AllTaskCloseController__c from BMCServiceDesk__Change_Request__c </xsl:text> </xsl:if> </queryString> </objects> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <fields> <xsl:apply-templates /> </fields> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="mappings/*"> <xsl:if test="string(@queryable) = '' or @queryable='true' "> <field> <xsl:value-of select="." /> </field> </xsl:if> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="query" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"><${key 1}>${value 1}</${key 1}></xsl:text> <xsl:if test="'${key 2}'!=''"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"><${key 2}>${value 2}</${key 2}></xsl:text> </xsl:if> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="value" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <entries> <xsl:apply-templates /> </entries> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="item"> <entry> <xsl:attribute name="id"> <xsl:value-of select="parameters/number/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:attribute> <xsl:for-each select="parameters/*"> <field> <xsl:attribute name="name"> <xsl:value-of select="local-name()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:attribute> <xsl:value-of select="./text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </field> </xsl:for-each> </entry> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="metadata" /> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: This workflow will find a change record for a given set of variables.
